description: mounted on ivory paper; architectural element with scrolls; putto at left sitting on architectural element; tiny putto in URQ
inscription: Inscribed in pen and brown ink in banderole: \"SVAVE\"
medium: Pen and brown ink wash over black chalk on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, December 14, 1992, no. 163, as "Roman School, 16th century," for £990, to Ormond]; [Flavia Ormond, London, 1992-93; sold, July 11, for £2,500, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1993-d. 2010; bequeathed to Mia)
title: Putti with the Arms of Pope Leo X
